duties_responsibilities.duty: Measure distances from grade stakes, drive stakes and stretch tight lines
Bolt, nail, align and block up forms
Signals equipment operators to facilitate alignment, movement and adjustment of machinery to conform to grade specifications
Levels earth to fine grade specifications using picks and shovels
Mixes concrete using float, trowel or screed
Positions, joins, aligns and seals pipe sections
Erects and dismantles scaffolding and/or structures
Mops, brushes or spreads paint compounds over surfaces for protection
Sprays materials such as water, sand, steam, vinyl, paint through hoses to clean, coat or seal surfaces
Grinds, sands and/or polishes surfaces such as concrete, marble, terrazzo, wood using abrasive tools or machines
Lifts, carries and holds building materials and supplies
Cleans tools, equipment, materials and work areas
May climb ladders and work at heights

education_certification.credential: Formal education/degree/certificate in construction, technical or trade school preferred
